pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, April 12, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, April 12, 2016:

Ottawa

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
